ygData.subject: Re: Invisibility spell
ygData.msgSnippet: Check every NPC spell merchant in ALL the guilds.  I found invisibility in Queynos.  It is a magicians spell anyway...should cost you only 4 gold. Look
ygData.messageBody:
Check every NPC spell merchant in ALL the guilds. I found invisibility in
Queynos. It is a magicians spell anyway...should cost you only 4 gold.
Look harder...it's there...trust me.

- Ziffnab
18th Wizard

-----Original Message-----
From: Shadowwalker [mailto:Shadowwalker@...]
Sent: Tuesday, May 04, 1999 10:20 AM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] Invisibility spell


Where can I find the spell for invisibility? I am currently nearest to
Qeynos, but I have been unable to find it there. Can anyone tell me which
cities they sell this spell in?

-Shadowwalker of Karana
